strengths: Saturn Engine II Cruiser — arguably the best ship in the game for cost/value
Hel-Titan PDS combines defensive PDS with ground force capability
Commander provides passive income via steady resource stream
Promissory Note adds +1 to planet values and grants multi-trait flexibility
Terragenesis/Awaken loop creates PDS network from sleeper tokens
weaknesses: Command token drain — Awaken ability uses a lot of tokens
Perceived as one of the most powerful factions — table will target you
Meta-game vulnerability: being perceived as strongest works against you
tips: Unlock Hero early to enhance Elysium's production
Two cruisers have Speed 2 — use for territorial expansion flexibility
Terraform planets without sleeper tokens, then activate systems to convert tokens into PDS
Monitor command token consumption carefully — Awaken is powerful but expensive
Saturn Engine II Cruiser should be prioritized in tech path
Don't let your reputation as a top-tier faction paint a target — play diplomatically

techPaths.note: Both faction unit upgrades are exceptional; Saturn Engine II is the priority
